cvm_pci_dma_cmd_t Union Reference

#include <cvm-pci-dma.h>

Detailed Description

Core: Information about PCI DMA operation.

This structure tells the core driver about the type of DMA operation to be submitted to Octeon PCI DMA engines. The Octeon PCI DMA command is built from the field defined here. This structure is passed to the PCI send/receive api's. It is not used in the instruction response API's.

Definition at line 213 of file cvm-pci-dma.h.

   uint64_t   pcielport:1
 CN56XX/63XX Only.
   uint64_t   rsvd:3
 Reserved.
   oct_pci_dma_flags_t   flags:8
 Flags describe the direction of DMA and post-DMA operations as defined in the enum oct_pci_dma_flags_t.
   uint64_t   ptr:40
 Physical address of WQE buffer or location in Octeon memory for post-DMA operation.
} s

Field Documentation

oct_pci_dma_flags_t cvm_pci_dma_cmd_t::flags

Flags describe the direction of DMA and post-DMA operations as defined in the enum oct_pci_dma_flags_t.

Definition at line 243 of file cvm-pci-dma.h.

uint64_t cvm_pci_dma_cmd_t::q_no

Determines DMA queue to use for this operation.

There are 2 DMA queues forCN38XX, 5 for CN56XX and 8 for CN63XX.

Definition at line 226 of file cvm-pci-dma.h.
